main event: An observer reported seeing a grayish unidentified object heading Northeast in Dayton, Ohio on January 4, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed traveling faster than typical aircraft and was approximately one mile away,The sighting lasted only a few seconds and there was no noise associated with the object,The object had no visible smoke or contrails,It was reported that the object appeared brighter than usual meteors,An analyst hypothesized that the sighting could be an aircraft despite the unusual characteristics.
